# Drow Blade Masters
## Overview
You have mastered the intricacies of the subtle curves and dull reflections of [[Drow|drow]] blades, allowing you to gracefully dismember your foes with the most cumbersome of blades.

## Effects
- Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
- You treat any [[Drow|drow]]-created blade with which you are proficient as though it was a finesse weapon.
